problem_names:
lemma map_append_append_maps:
  assumes map:"map f xs = ys@zs"
  obtains xs' xs'' where "map f xs' = ys" and "map f xs'' = zs" and "xs=xs'@xs''"

lemma  path_split_general:
assumes all:"\<forall>zs. xs \<noteq> ys@zs"
obtains j zs where "xs = (take j ys)@zs" and "j < length ys"
  and "\<forall>k > j. \<forall>zs'. xs \<noteq> (take k ys)@zs'"
translations:
lemma map_append_append_maps:
  assumes map:"map f xs = ys@zs"
  obtains xs' xs'' where "map f xs' = ys" and "map f xs'' = zs" and "xs=xs'@xs''"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>xs' xs''.
        \<lbrakk>map f xs' = ys; map f xs'' = zs; xs = xs' @ xs''\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
by (metis append_eq_conv_conj append_take_drop_id assms drop_map take_map that)
text \<open>Lemma concerning splitting of @{term list}s\<close>

lemma  path_split_general:
assumes all:"\<forall>zs. xs \<noteq> ys@zs"
obtains j zs where "xs = (take j ys)@zs" and "j < length ys"
  and "\<forall>k > j. \<forall>zs'. xs \<noteq> (take k ys)@zs'"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>j zs.
        \<lbrakk>xs = take j ys @ zs; j < length ys;
         \<forall>k>j. \<forall>zs'. xs \<noteq> take k ys @ zs'\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
proof(atomize_elim)

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>j zs.
       xs = take j ys @ zs \<and>
       j < length ys \<and>
       (\<forall>k>j. \<forall>zs'. xs \<noteq> take k ys @ zs')
from \<open>\<forall>zs. xs \<noteq> ys@zs\<close>

proof (chain)
picking this:
  \<forall>zs. xs \<noteq> ys @ zs

show "\<exists>j zs. xs = take j ys @ zs \<and> j < length ys \<and> 
               (\<forall>k>j. \<forall>zs'. xs \<noteq> take k ys @ zs')"

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<forall>zs. xs \<noteq> ys @ zs

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>j zs.
       xs = take j ys @ zs \<and>
       j < length ys \<and>
       (\<forall>k>j. \<forall>zs'. xs \<noteq> take k ys @ zs')
proof(induct ys arbitrary:xs)

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>xs.
       \<forall>zs. xs \<noteq> [] @ zs \<Longrightarrow>
       \<exists>j zs.
          xs = take j [] @ zs \<and>
          j < length [] \<and>
          (\<forall>k>j. \<forall>zs'. xs \<noteq> take k [] @ zs')
 2. \<And>a ys xs.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>xs.
                   \<forall>zs. xs \<noteq> ys @ zs \<Longrightarrow>
                   \<exists>j zs.
                      xs = take j ys @ zs \<and>
                      j < length ys \<and>
                      (\<forall>k>j.
                          \<forall>zs'. xs \<noteq> take k ys @ zs');
        \<forall>zs. xs \<noteq> (a # ys) @ zs\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>j zs.
                            xs = take j (a # ys) @ zs \<and>
                            j < length (a # ys) \<and>
                            (\<forall>k>j.
                                \<forall>zs'.
                                   xs \<noteq> take k (a # ys) @ zs')
case Nil

proof (state)
this:
  \<forall>zs. xs \<noteq> [] @ zs

goal (2 subgoals):

                                \<forall>zs'.
                                   xs \<noteq> take k (a # ys) @ zs')

this:
